document.full_text: the death toll from a monster tornado that savaged joplin, missouri, rose to 125 on wednesday and tornadoes overnight in nearby states caused at least 15 more deaths.
document.title: tornado death toll rises, no more survivors found
lines_and_colors: the death toll from a monster tornado that savaged joplin, missouri, rose to 125 on wednesday and tornadoes overnight in nearby states caused at least 15 more deaths.
